WRITING.TEXT: Not ugly, maybe some better looking glasses would amp it up.
Completely agree, very beautiful. But stylishly dated.
You have such an odd look, not for everyone. But I love it. Have you ever considered modeling? You could book a lot of work if you're on the taller end of the spectrum.
You look great. Fresh and youthful.
Your head looks peanut shaped. But i think it's the glasses or something. I would try out some contacts.

Very handsome man, model-esque. I see what your saying though, I would simply relax your lower lip more when featuring your pearly whites. try getting some bottom teeth in there just a little bit. I like the smirks for sure.
Handsome, I wouldn't do that to your mustache, you either have to commit fully to it which it doesn't look like you are.
I would simply shave and change your hairstyle, you are handsome.
I think you are pretty, from what I can see. Another more clear picture would be better.
Nah, you are handsome/cute. I honestly don't see anything that needs to be changed.
Overall handsome, I would maybe try out some scruff of beard.
Very handsome, even more so holding a kitty.
Very handsome, great nose.
Handsome man. I would just trim the oddly wispy facial hair.
Handsome, I would maybe trim up the sides of your hair. Overall stud.
I would get contacts. Some glasses prescriptions tend to shrink peoples eyes significantly making them look oddly small. You can tell this is the case here. Generally handsome though!
Handsome, great taste in fashion too.
I think you are handsome, the whatsapp edits are horrendous. Your original shot is very good looking.
I think you are handsome, I wouldn't worry about your ears at all (in regards to other comments) I like them.
Handsome, I would honestly just change your hair. Maybe something shorter.
